entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
